text: Peter Richard Orszag (born December 16, 1968) is an American banker and former government official. He is the CEO of Financial Advisory at Lazard. He was the 37th Director of the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) under President Barack Obama and had also was the Director of the Congressional Budget Office (CBO). ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Directors of the Office of Management and Budget Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:American economists Category:Scientists from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Peter R. Orszag
